conbody.p: Dialog architecture refers to a case where the dominant model for views in the application is that of dialogs. One particular case example of this is when the main view is run as a dialog. Multipage dialogs can be used to give a set of views in conformance with the Symbian UI concept.

note.p: Nested dialogs can use quite a lot of stack space if not written carefully.

p.draft-comment: Note to reviewers: We plan to develop this section further in future releases of the CDL.
